title: Crystal harpoon (The Gauntlet)

properties.value: A crystal harpoon is a basic harpoon that is given to the player at the start of The Gauntlet. It can be used to fish raw paddlefish.

A crystal harpoon is a basic harpoon that is given to the player at the start of The Gauntlet. It can be used to fish raw paddlefish.

Unlike its overworld counterpart, this variant does not have a special attack.

[[File:Crystal harpoon (The Gauntlet) detail.png|130px|left]]
A '''crystal harpoon''' is a basic harpoon that is given to the player at the start of [[The Gauntlet]]. It can be used to fish [[raw paddlefish]].

Unlike its [[crystal harpoon|overworld counterpart]], this variant does not have a [[special attack]].
